condition.ab: Light brown papyrus. The original cutting lines have been preserved on the top and partially on the left side. Five large holes on the right half of the papyrus caused a loss of one word in eight lines. There are two vertical folding lines visible along which the fibers have gotten slightly damaged. The right side is broken off with a loss of three to four words at the beginning of the lines.
